name: False awakening
description:
False awakening is a 2D pixel art horror game where you play as a person who just woke up for work. And then woke up again. And again. And again.

There are some flashing lights in this game so please do not play if they will negatively affect your health.
There is also a bit of creepy imagery but since it's pixel art it's not that scary.

This game was made for Ludum dare 47, the theme was "Stuck in a loop"
